Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa! Hey, are you okay, Mister?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Here, let me--
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_R><FACE_LOSS>WHOOPS!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Gah...I'm sorry, Mister.
Er, never mind that. Are you okay, sonny?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nnngh...
Help.
Watch.

Thank you both so much for all the help.
<PAGE>
If I'd tried to do that all by myself, the sun
would've gone down before I finished.
<PAGE>
It isn't much, but here. How about you two
young'uns take this and get yourselves
something good to eat.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh! Thanks, Mister!

Ah, it's nothing. Well, I'd better be on my way.
See you later.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Woohoo! Wasn't that awesome of that old guy,
<MYNAME>? Let's take his advice and hit the
restaurant! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey. A puppy! What's it doing out here by
itself? You think it's lost?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmmm...I don't see its owner anywhere around.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay! I'll take this little puppy and look for his
owner. C'mere...uh...Sebastian!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_R>Yeowch!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_LOSS>C'mon, Sebastian! Knock it off. Are you hungry
or somethin'? Just so you know, I'm not very
tasty.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R>Ow!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, uh, <MYNAME>?
Help.
Watch.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Gah! Why does he keep doing that?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sebastian...!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Aw, man! C'mon, I'm the cool dude who's
gonna help you find your owner! You shouldn't
go around biting cool dudes!

Marianne! Marianne, where are you? Come to
mama, Marianne!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh? What's that all about?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh well. The dog found its owner, so I guess
all's well that ends well.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Anyway, let's hurry up and hit the restaurant!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Phew! We finally made it. Time for some
foooood!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? Wait...don't tell me... Um, <MYNAME>?
What day is today...?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Nooooooo! I...I can't believe that the ONE day I
decided to come, they're closed!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>It...it just can't be. Aw maaaan...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>...I'm tired. Well, make that tired and
hungry... What am I gonna do?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey there. What're you two doing, loitering
around the restaurant?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What, again? Geez. Do you ever learn?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm closed on the same day every week, y'know.
It's not like I choose a day at random to torment
you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Uuugh...I can't deny it...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah well. C'mon. Get in here, you two.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you're really that hungry, I'll open up just for
you. But I'm charging you full price, got it?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Woo-hoo! Raeger, I love you, man!
<PAGE>
<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Eww. Don't say that. It's gross.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is so awesome! C'mon, <MYNAME>! Let's
eat!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh yeah!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>? Thanks for helping me with
everything.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh. C'mon, let's go!

It felt like it took forever, but it looks like they're
finally done picking them all up. Maybe I
should've helped...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>! Could ya stop standing around and
give me a hand over here?
